column1: * 1 - Death of King Aragorn of the Reunited Kingdom of Gondor and Arnor. Eldarion
* It is said that the beds of Meriadoc Brandybuck and Peregrin Took were set beside the bed of the great king.
* Legolas builds a grey ship in Ithilien
column2: and with Gimli sails down Anduin and so over Belegaer. This marks the end in Middle-earth of the Fellowship of the Ring.
